```{r}
Cage.Mass <- read.csv("~/Theses Pieces/Tank Pad Pilot Study/Cage Mass.csv")
```

```{r}
mass <- aov(Cage.Mass$Mass ~ Cage.Mass$ï..Tank)
summary(mass)
```

```{r}
mass1 <- aov(Cage.Mass$Mass ~ Cage.Mass$ï..Tank * as.factor(Cage.Mass$Date))
summary(mass1)
```

```{r}
height <- read.csv("~/Theses Pieces/Tank Pad Pilot Study/Tank Height.csv")
```

```{r}
h <- aov(height$Height ~ height$ï..Tank*as.factor(height$Date))
summary(h)

```


```{r}
gill <- read.csv("~/Theses Pieces/Tank Pad Pilot Study/Gill Samples Metrics.csv")
```

```{r}
mass <- aov(gill$Weight ~ gill$Tank*gill$Date)
summary(mass)
```

```{r}
mass1 <- aov(Weight ~ Tank + Cage %in% Tank, data = gill)
summary(mass1)
```

```{r}
length <- aov(Length ~ Tank*Date, data = gill)
summary(length)
TukeyHSD(length)
```

```{r}
length1 <- aov(Length ~ Tank + Cage %in% Tank, data = gill)
summary(length1)
```

```{r}
Chla <- read.csv("~/Theses Pieces/Tank Pad Pilot Study/Post.Chla.csv")
```

```{r}
chl1 <- aov(Chla$Chla ~ as.factor(Chla$Time), subset = Chla$Tank == 'L1')
summary (chl1)
TukeyHSD(chl1)
```

```{r}
chl2 <- aov(Chla$Chla ~ as.factor(Chla$Time), subset = Chla$Tank == 'L2')
summary (chl2)
TukeyHSD(chl2)
```

```{r}
chl4 <- aov(Chla$Chla ~ as.factor(Chla$Time), subset = Chla$Tank == 'L4')
summary (chl4)
TukeyHSD(chl4)
```


```{r}
chl <- aov(Chla$Chla ~ as.factor(Chla$Tank), subset = Chla$Time == '0')
summary(chl)
TukeyHSD(chl)
```

```{r}
plot(Chla$Chla ~ Chla$Time, subset = Chla$Tank == 'L1', type = "o", col ='red')
lines(Chla$Chla~ Chla$Time, subset = Chla$Tank == 'L2', type = "o", col = "blue)
```
